Articles.Content:
I present you, the 

**JigaBachi-02 VTOL dropship**

![Drb0L3S.png](http://i.imgur.com/Drb0L3S.png)

(special thanks to esinohio for the render)

This beauty can do a multitude of tasks, and can easily do vertical landings.

**Features:**

- 2 VTOL engines, 2 CTOL engines
- Autopilot
- Spacey cargo bay which can be adapted for a variety of tasks
- Water landing capability
- Correctional thrusters for easy and precise translation
- 38km MSL operational ceiling
- Worldwide range

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

**Action groups:**

1. Toggle main engines
2. Toggle VTOL engines
3. Toggle cargo bay

 5. Toggle ladders

Abort - decouple anything attached to docking nodes.

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

Hope you enjoy it!

>

[Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/e8h01y4j0lew6at/JigaBachi-02.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T16:53:14Z" title="03/31/2015 04:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by SpaceXray**

> 
> -Cheesy Ghost In A Shell Joke-

Love that anime! This thing was partly inspired by it. And I like the name too. Don't recall them ever giving a name to their tiltrotor.
I'm prepping to fix any issues that might arise once 1.0 hits, and I am thinking of the possibility of turning it into an SSTO
